resources.string:
- Each correct question will give you 20 points
 - Checkbox answers score either 20 or 0 points
 - EditText answers are not case sensitive.
 - RadioButton answers have only one correct choice.
 - You have to answer all questions to know your score.
1. What does Bluetooth technology is actually named from?
A mythic sword from Lord of The Rings
Nickname of a famous nordic king
2. List all elements that ARE in the periodic table
3. Write the name of the company who develops Android
4. How old is Android since its first release?
5. What is the answer to the ultimate question of life, the universe and everything?
To learn Android and be happy
To read all questions from Stack Overflow
I will take a sleep to think about it...
